attributes.action: Start a public nationwide inquiry into grooming/rape gangs in towns and cities.
attributes.additional_details: To call for a full national inquiry into sexual rape gangs, which is needed to address a deeply troubling and systemic issue that has caused immense harm to countless individuals and communities.
attributes.background: Public confidence in the justice system and government institutions has been eroded due to perceived cover-ups or insufficient action. A transparent inquiry would demonstrate a commitment to justice and rebuilding trust.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
